verse: The word of the Eternal One came to me again, this time over two days.

So I did exactly what He told me to do. During the day, I brought out my bag as if it were an exileâ€™s bag. Then in the evening, I dug out an opening in the wall with my hands. I put my bag over my shoulder and carried it out into the dark. People watched as I acted out all of this.
The word of the Eternal came to me the next morning and told me how to explain the sign to the exiles.
The word of the Eternal came to me yet again.
The word of the Eternal came to me with another message.
The word of the Eternal came to me.
